snippet: The teams are both still jockeying for the postseason and can affect each other’s position.
abstract: New York Knicks and Brooklyn Nets prepare for first of their last two clashes during the regular season; Nets could do considerable damage to the Knicks' fleeting playoff hopes if they win both games.
lead_paragraph: The teams are both still jockeying for the postseason and can affect each other’s position.

headline.main: Last Clashes for Nets and Knicks
headline.print_headline: Last Clashes for Nets and Knicks
